metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34981 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
[Bluetooth CMTP Module Double Free Privilege Escalation Vulnerability]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-34981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
